Pictophonetic: 京 indicates the sound; 魚 (fish) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples: 鯨魚 [ jīng yú ]: whale; Classifiers: 条
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right

    • 京 [ jīng ] capital city
heisig_chinese_memo: If fish were cities, the whale would surely be the capital.
heisig_constituent: whale, fish, bound up, rice field, brains, oven-fire, barbecue, capital, tall, top hat, mouth, small, little
heisig_story: The whale swallows a whole school of fish, who turn their new abode into a proper little fish-capital.
koohiiStory1: If fish were cities, the whale would surely be the capital.
koohiiStory2: When the whale was first discovered it was the biggest fish people had ever seen. Stories exaggerated its size - people said it was as big as the entire capital city!
jp_example_words: 捕鯨(ほげい): whaling, whale fishing
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you travel to the fish capital, you'll find the leader of all fish, the mighty whale! Okay, so a whale isn't technically a fish, but that's why it makes such a good leader. You can usually only find whales hanging around near the capital because they really enjoy ruling over all the other fish. They are the biggest, after all.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture the underwater fish capital. Statues of whales line the fishy streets, and all of the fish bow down to the whale ruler's giant body.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The whale who resides over the capital just happens to be gay (げい). You only know this because his husband is a man whale too. Actually, now that you think about it, all the whales you've ever met have been gay.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture the gay whale ruler holding whale hands... fins? with his whale husband. They're so cute.
Ru_Radicals: 亠 (крышка), 口 (рот), 小 (маленький), 杰, 田 (рисовое поле), 魚 (рыба)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the capital (京) fish (魚) is a whale
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The capital is the big fish city of the country.  You might say it's the 'whale'.
humanum_full_description_en:
" Fish ", the sound of " Beijing ", the original meaning is aquatic mammalian whale. "Shuowen": "The sea is big fish. From the fish, the sound. The "Chunqiu Chuan" says: take its salamander. Whale, or from Beijing." "Selected Works-Zuo Si "Wu Du Fu": "So The long whale swallows, and the salamander spit."

" Whale " can mean huge. The Northern Wei Dynasty, Li Daoyuan, "Shui Jing Zhu-Mian Shui I": "Han River is east of the turtle pond and is a whale beach. Whales are great."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " fish " and " jing ", the original meaning is aquatic mammals, whales.
humanum_full_description:
「魚」，「京」聲，本義為水栖哺乳綱動物鯨魚。《說文》：「海大魚也。从魚，畺聲。《春秋傳》曰：取其䲔鯢。鯨，䲔或从京。」《文選‧左思〈吳都賦〉》：「於是乎長鯨吞航，修鯢吐浪。」

　　「鯨」可表示巨大。北魏酈道元《水經注‧沔水一》：「漢水又東逕鱉池而為鯨灘。鯨，大也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「魚」，「京」聲，本義為水栖哺乳綱動物鯨魚。

①生長在海洋中的哺乳動物，形狀像魚，胎生，鼻孔在頭的上部，用肺呼吸。體長可達三十米，是現在世界上最大的動物。肉可食，脂肪可以做油(俗稱“鯨魚”)：鯨吞。鯨鯢(即“鯨”，喻兇惡的人)。

鯨字的基本解释

鯨
jīng
见“鲸”。

鯨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qíng］［jīng］
［《廣韻》渠京切，平庚，羣。］
亦作“1”。“鲸1”的繁体字。
(1)水栖哺乳纲动物。体形长大，外形似鱼，小约1米，大至30米。头大，眼小，耳壳退化。前肢呈鳍状，后肢退化。尾鳍叉形，呈水平状。成体皮肤无毛，皮下脂肪增厚，用肺呼吸，可潜水一刻钟至一小时。胎生。皮、肉、脂肪均可利用。鲸的种类很多，如蓝鲸、抹香鲸、海豚、江豚以及我国特有的淡水海豚即白暨豚等都属于鲸类。
(2)指大，巨大。
(3)通“擎（qíng）”举。

鯨字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鯨； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1473第12
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?渠京切，音擎。【說文】本作䲔，海大魚也。【玉篇】魚之王。【古今注】鯨魚者，海魚也。大者長千里，小者數十丈。其雌曰鯢，大者亦長千里，眼如明月珠。互詳鯢字註。【後漢·班固傳】於是發鯨魚，鏗華鐘。【註】海岸中有大魚名鯨。又有獸名蒲牢。蒲牢素畏鯨魚，鯨魚擊蒲牢，蒲牢輒大鳴。凡鐘欲令其聲大者，故作蒲牢於其上，撞鐘者名爲鯨魚。又【西京雜記】漢武刻石爲鯨，置昆明池，每雷雨，魚常鳴吼，鱗鬣皆動。【杜甫詩】石鯨鱗甲動秋風。又【集韻】渠良切，音彊。義同。

whale

whale
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qíng］［jīng］
["Guangyun" Qu Jingqie, Ping Geng, Qun. ]
Also called "1". Traditional characters for "鯨1".
(1) Aquatic mammals. It grows up and looks like a fish, about 1 meter in size and 30 meters in size. The head is large, the eyes are small, and the ears are degraded. The forelegs are fin-shaped, and the hind limbs are degenerated. The caudal fin is forked and horizontal. Adults have hairless skin and thickened subcutaneous fat. They breathe with their lungs and can dive for a quarter of an hour to an hour. viviparous. Skin, meat, and fat can be used. There are many types of whales, such as blue whales, sperm whales, dolphins, finless porpoises, and our country’s unique freshwater dolphins, Baiji dolphins, all belong to cetaceans.
(2) Means big and huge.
(3) Through "Qíng (qíng)" exercise.
whale
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　 Whale; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1473 Page 12
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Qu Jing cut, sound engine. [Said the text] This is a 岔, a big fish in the sea. 【Jade articles】The king of fish. [Ancient and Modern Note] Whales, marine fish. The big one is thousands of miles long, the small one is tens of feet. The female is called a salamander, and the older ones are thousands of miles long, with eyes like moon beads. Detailed notes on salamander characters. [Later Han·Bangu Biography] So he sent a whale, Keng Huazhong. [Note] There are big fish and whales on the coast. There is also the animal name Pu Lao. Pu Lao Su feared whales, whales hit Pu Lao, Pu Lao crowed loudly. Anyone who wants to make the bell sound louder pretends to put it on it, and the person who strikes the bell is called a whale. Also [Xijing Miscellaneous] The Hanwu carved stone is a whale, and it is set in Kunming Pool. Every thunderstorm, the fish often roar and the scales move. [Poem by Du Fu] The scales of the stone whale move in the autumn breeze. Also [Jiyun] Qu Liang cuts, the sound is strong. The same meaning.

jīng, qíng
вм. 鲸
Radicals: 魚, 京  (fish, capital)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you travel to the fish capital, you'll find the leader of all fish, the mighty whale! Okay, so a whale isn't technically a fish, but that's why it makes such a good leader. You can usually only find whales hanging around near the capital because they really enjoy ruling over all the other fish. They are the biggest, after all.
Picture the underwater fish capital. Statues of whales line the fishy streets, and all of the fish bow down to the whale ruler's giant body.
Reading Mnemonic
The whale who resides over the capital just happens to be gay (げい). You only know this because his husband is a man whale too. Actually, now that you think about it, all the whales you've ever met have been gay.
Picture the gay whale ruler holding whale hands... fins? with his whale husband. They're so cute.
